reviewText: Pay Attention. I am serious! There are actors in very tricky rolls! Some of the actors we recognize from more recent rolls as heroes. Some of the "Good guys" are not as good as others. There are good guys that have "their own agendas" But seat of your pants on the edge of your seats would not be unfair. There is Action, Twist and turns, betrayals and almost a "happy ending" But we must learn from the past.
